description: The Accino Family's ice castle headquarters located in the frozen region of Hyokaido. A massive fortress made of ice that serves as both the family's home and base of operations for their bounty hunting activities.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Don Accino Final Battle
keyEvents.description: The climactic battle between Luffy and Don Accino takes place within Lovely Land as the environment becomes increasingly unstable.
keyEvents.significance: The location of the Ice Hunter Arc's final battle.

keyEvents.title: Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka Destroys Lovely Land
keyEvents.description: The impact of Luffy's finishing attack triggers the destruction of Lovely Land.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Accino Family's base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Destruction of Lovely Land
keyEvents.description: Lovely Land collapses and is destroyed following Luffy's victory, forcing everyone to evacuate.
keyEvents.significance: The permanent destruction of the location symbolizes the end of the Ice Hunter Arc.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed by the impact of Luffy's Hyakuman-do Bazooka and subsequent collapse

description: A winter island region in the Grand Line characterized by frozen waters and icebergs. The domain of the Accino Family bounty hunters and location of their fortress Lovely Land.

keyEvents.title: Phoenix Pirates vs Accino Family
keyEvents.description: The Phoenix Pirates engage in battle with Campacino and remaining Accino Family members in the Hyokaido region.
keyEvents.significance: The Phoenix Pirates reclaim their honor by fighting their former captors.

keyEvents.title: Farewell from Hyokaido
keyEvents.description: Puzzle and the Phoenix Pirates bid farewell to the Straw Hats from Hyokaido, promising to meet again in the New World.
keyEvents.significance: The departure from Hyokaido marks the end of the Ice Hunter Arc.

statusHistory.reason: Winter island in the Grand Line
